title: Fredericksburg & Spotsylvania National Military Park: Civilians
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     People     Civilians                 Civilians         Clara Barton, 1866 Matthew Brady   Clara Barton 1821-1912 Civil War-era nurse and founder of the American Red Cross        The Chancellor family home was how the battle got its name NPS Photo  Sue Chancellor  1847-1935 Resident of Chancellorsville during the battle         Painting of William Fitzhugh Gary Stapko   William Fitzhugh 1741-1809 Original owner of Chatham Manor        John Lee Pratt Virginia Museum of Fine Arts     John Lee Pratt 1879-1975 Last private owner of Chatham Manor        Dr. Mary Walker proudly wearing her Medal of Honor Library of Congress     Dr. Mary Walker 1832-1919 Civil War era doctor and the only woman to earn the Medal of Honor in American history         Walt Whitman Matthew Brady     Walt Whitman 1819 - 1892 American poet and nurse after the Battle of Fredericksburg
